name: Essence Control
description: Proficiencies that relate to casting Essence magic.

name: Essence Technology
description: Proficiencies that relate to using technology relying on Essence materials or magic.

name: Essence Theory
description: Proficiencies that relate to the scientific and chemical principles of Essence materials.

name: Shi Cryptology
description: Proficiencies that relate to decrypting SGA documents and computers.
